leba_F1_01: I wear blue-filtering, orange-tinted, and/or red-tinted glasses indoors during the day
leba_F1_02: I wear blue-filtering, orange-tinted, and/or red-tinted glasses outdoors during the day
leba_F1_03: I wear blue-filtering, orange-tinted, and/or red-tinted glasses within 1 hour before attempting to fall asleep
leba_F2_04: I spend 30 minutes or less per day (in total) outside
leba_F2_05: I spend between 30 minutes and 1 hour per day (in total) outside
leba_F2_06: I spend between 1 and 3 hours per day (in total) outside
leba_F2_07: I spend more than 3 hours per day (in total) outside
leba_F2_08: I spend as much time outside as possible
leba_F2_09: I go for a walk or exercise outside within 2 hours after waking up
leba_F3_10: I use my mobile phone within 1 hour before attempting to fall asleep
leba_F3_11: I look at my mobile phone screen immediately after waking up
leba_F3_12: I check my phone when I wake up at night
leba_F3_13: I look at my smartwatch within 1 hour before attempting to fall asleep
leba_F3_14: I look at my smartwatch when I wake up at night
leba_F4_15: I dim my mobile phone screen within 1 hour before attempting to fall asleep
leba_F4_16: I use a blue-filter app on my computer screen within 1 hour before attempting to fall asleep
leba_F4_17: I use as little light as possible when I get up during the night
leba_F4_18: I dim my computer screen within 1 hour before attempting to fall asleep
leba_F5_19: I use tunable lights to create a healthy light environment
leba_F5_20: I use LEDs to create a healthy light environment
leba_F5_21: I use a desk lamp when I do focused work
leba_F5_22: I use an alarm with a dawn simulation light
leba_F5_23: I turn on the lights immediately after waking up
psqi_01: During the past month, what time have you usually gone to bed at night?
psqi_02: During the past month, how long (in minutes) has it usually taken you to fall asleep each night?
psqi_03: During the past month, what time have you usually gotten up in the morning?
psqi_04: During the past month, how many hours of actual sleep did you get at night? (This may be different than the number of hours you spent in bed.)
psqi_05_1: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you... - Cannot get to sleep within 30 minutes
psqi_05_2: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you... - Wake up in the middle of the night or early morning
psqi_05_3: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you... - Have to get up to use the bathroom
psqi_05_4: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you... - Cannot breathe comfortably
psqi_05_5: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you... - Cough or snore loudly
psqi_05_6: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you... - Feel too cold
psqi_05_7: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you... - Feel too hot
psqi_05_8: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you... - Have bad dreams
psqi_05_9: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you... - Have pain
psqi_05_10: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you... - Other reason(s), please describe:
psqi_05_10_TEXT: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you... - Other reason(s), please describe: - Text
psqi_06: During the past month, how often have you taken medicine to help you sleep (prescribed or "over the counter")?
psqi_07: During the past month, how often have you had trouble staying awake while driving, eating meals, or engaging in social activity?
psqi_08: During the past month, how much of a problem has it been for you to keep up enough enthusiasm to get things done?
psqi_09: During the past month, how would you rate your sleep quality overall?
psqi_10: Do you have a bed partner or room mate?
psqi_11_1: If you have a room mate or bed partner, ask him/her how often in the past month you have had: - Loud snoring
psqi_11_2: If you have a room mate or bed partner, ask him/her how often in the past month you have had: - Long pauses between breaths while asleep
psqi_11_3: If you have a room mate or bed partner, ask him/her how often in the past month you have had: - Legs twitching or jerking while you sleep
psqi_11_4: If you have a room mate or bed partner, ask him/her how often in the past month you have had: - Episodes of disorientation or confusion during sleep
psqi_11_5: If you have a room mate or bed partner, ask him/her how often in the past month you have had: - Other restlessness while you sleep, please describe:
psqi_11_5_TEXT: If you have a room mate or bed partner, ask him/her how often in the past month you have had: - Other restlessness while you sleep, please describe: - Text
